item.description:
JOINT EVENT WITH

BOSTON 35+ WINE, DINE, DANCE AND BE MERRY MEET UP :

  • Saturday, May 18, 2013

    7:15 PM

  • Club Oberon

    2 Arrow Street, Cambridge, MA (edit map)

  • Oh, yes, Donkey Show again!!!!!..........our favorite disco party, and by popular demand.  Outside of the Black Eyed Peas, this is my favorite music and I guarantee that "Tonight's Going to be a Great, Great, Night....Let's Live it up" as their song goes.  So, let's do it - disco and rock with the performers and have a fantabulous evening together on Saturday May 18th.

     

    ****A.R.T. IS GIVING US A GREAT DEAL $10 DANCE FLOOR TICKET (INSTEAD OF $38.50) - PLEASE PURCHASE YOUR TICKET ON-LINE :

  • Our code DISCOMEETUP is ready!


  • Here is a link to the ticket website - http://bit.ly/XqNOsa

    Select May 18th 7:30 and enter DISCOMEETUP for the $10 dance Floor Ticket.  then  CONFIRM TO ME ON OUR EVENT SITE, THAT YOU HAVE DONE SO IN ORDER TO GET A HEADCOUNT FOR THIS SPECIAL RATE:********

    *

    ========================================

    You haven't partied if you haven't been to the Donkey Show.  Don't let anyone tell you it is wild, raunchy, raucous and crazy (which it is!!) and that going there for our TWENTIETH TIME  makes us the ultimate party animals.....all true. If you like to live it up and make merry then there is no merrier way to do it.  So please join us to celebrate life, dancing and good friends once again.  Check out our past events and photos at the Donkey Show and see for yourself....and be there with us.

    We will be meeting at the Grafton Pub for a light dinner at 6:00 before the show (Part 1) and walk over at 7:30 when doors open. (Part 2)


    The Oberon is on Arrowstreet and Mass. Ave.

    ================================

    MORE ABOUT THE DONKEY SHOW:

    This event at the Donkey show which is, without a doubt, THE most fun and hilarious event in Boston with dancing to fantastic music (disco and rock - studio 54-style atmosphere) the minute you walk in - actors and public all together. A raucous and ultimate party event....nothing like it. ======================== The Donkey Show is the intoxicating international sensation that takes you behind the velvet ropes into a glittered wonderland of decadence, divas, and disco, inspired by Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream. Come party on the dance floor to all the disco hits you know by heart as The Donkey Show unfolds all around you. It's a show . . . it's a party . . . it's the ultimate disco experience.

     

    The Donkey Show - WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT IT: "The most alive, immersive piece of theater I've ever been dunked in." - Boston Phoenix "Riveting. . . . So visceral that words seem almost beside the point." - Boston Globe Come party on the dance floor to all the 70s disco hits you know by heart(including “We are Family,” “I Love the Nightlife,” “Car Wash,” “Ring My Bell,” and “Last Dance.” ) as the show unfolds around you. Pre-show starts at 7:30PM. Let's meet at 7:15 in front of Oberon's.  The Donkey Show tells the story of A Midsummer Night’s Dream through the great 70s anthems,  The enchanted forest of Shakespeare’s classic comedy becomes the glittered world of retro disco as the lovers escape from their real lives to experience a night of dream, abandon, and fantasy. A.R.T.’s OBERON houses this magical romp. Join the party under the disco ball.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in front of Oberon's (or inside the entrance if it is raining or cold!!) or ask for me by name at the ticket desk

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: DANCE & MAKE WILD MERRY @ our 20th DONKEY SHOW EXTRAVAGANZA - SAT. 5/18 AT 7:15p
